channel.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
channel.description:
http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/04/19/us-houston-shooting-idUSTRE73I5E920110419
INB4 GUN DEBATE
Before starting off any kind of nerdrage about guns we must all agree: Dumbest parents in history.

item.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Why did it go off? Was the gun cocked? One should be able to drop a gun without it discharging the bullet on anything but the worst of the saturday-night specials.
good point is good

Read full topic
item.source: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt

item.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:391750”]That is a NICE pump action shotgun. I’ve always wanted one of those, they seem really effective in the games I’ve played.

I get a little tired of these stories. Firearms shouldn’t be called into question every time somebody fails their children. The vast majority of family homes safely maintain firearms without any such incidence.[/quote]
Lothy Likes Getting Kids Hurt
inb4retardedflamebecauseimjustkidding.

Read full topic
item.source: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt

item.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Speljohan:

we must all agree: Dumbest parents in history.

100% Agreed.

My parents taught me about guns from a very young age, and I would never have dreamed of even touching one unless my dad was around and gave me permission. I think part of the problem is parents don’t talk to their children about guns, and so they are curious and don’t know the danger.

But yes, this is entirely the stupid parent’s fault.

Read full topic

item.title: 6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

U.S. – 19 Apr 11

6-year-old has gun in school, three children hurt

Three children were injured at lunchtime on Tuesday at a Houston elementary school when a gun fell out of a 6-year-old's pocket and went off in the cafeteria, Houston Independent School District officials said.

INB4 GUN DEBATE

Before starting off any kind of nerdrage about guns we must all agree: Dumbest parents in history.

Read full topic
